charges.charge_description: UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. WAS IN AND AFFECTING INTERSTATE  COMMERCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant was found guilty on count(s) one(1) of the indictment. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of: two-hundred-thirty-five (235) months on count one of the indictment. The costs of incarceration are waived. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of: five (5) years on count one of the indictment. Standard conditions of supervision. Criminal monetary penalties. Schedule of payments. Additional Forfeited Property. Preliminary Order of Forfeiture.
